HERO_CONTENT: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in building modern web and mobile applications. I love turning complex problems into elegant solutions. I have a strong background in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and various other technologies. My goal is to create user-friendly applications that provide a seamless experience. Let's connect and build something amazing together!
ABOUT_TEXT: I am a dedicated and versatile full stack developer with a passion for creating efficient and user-friendly web applications. With 5 years of professional experience, I have worked with a variety of technologies, including React, Next.js, Node.js, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. My journey in web development began with a deep curiosity for how things work, and it has evolved into a career where I continuously strive to learn and adapt to new challenges. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy solving complex problems to deliver high-quality solutions. Outside of coding, I enjoy staying active, exploring new technologies, and contributing to open-source projects.

PROJECTS.title: Aarogya -Your Personal AI Health Assistant
PROJECTS.description: Aarogya is a smart medical chatbot designed to provide reliable health guidance and support. Fine-tuned using the Google Gemini API, Aarogya leverages cutting-edge multimodal AI to understand user queries, process symptoms, and offer contextual health information.

PROJECTS.title: ChatApp- Real-Time Messaging Platform
PROJECTS.description: ChatApp is a real-time messaging platform that allows users to send and receive messages instantly. Built with modern web technologies, ChatApp provides a seamless, feature-rich interface for both text and voice communication.

PROJECTS.title: StudyNotion- Comprehensive Ed-Tech Platform
PROJECTS.description: StudyNotion is a comprehensive ed-tech platform designed to deliver interactive, scalable, and personalized online education. Built with modern web technologies, StudyNotion connects instructors and learners through a seamless, feature-rich interface.

PROJECTS.title: Quiz_Portal- Interactive Assessment Platform
PROJECTS.description: Quiz Portal is a full-stack application that allows administrators to create and manage quizzes and enables users to browse, take, and review quiz results. Built on the MERN stack, it offers a streamlined experience for both instructors (admins) and learners (users).

PROJECTS.title: BillSpitter - Smart Bill Splitting App
PROJECTS.description: BillSpitter is a user-friendly Next.js application that helps groups split bills fairly. Users can input individual names and amounts paid, and the app calculates who owes whom how much so that everyone contributes equally. Perfect for roommates, travel groups, or shared expenses.

CONTACT.address: Ayurvedic Layout NIT Complex Sakkardara, Nagpur, Maharashtra, India
